title: Ranked loss because 2 afks for most of game and 3 at one point
body: Tilted, thats all i can say and the link for the game. i want my lp back, unfair and we couldn't even remake. http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2315985755/202235797?tab=overview

replies.body:
It certainly sucks when someone goes AFK in a match, *especially* if you end up losing LP because of it. Unfortunately, we cannot modify or give you LP back due to this. We're locked out of making any changes to LP as an effort to prevent abuse of the system.

A [/Remake](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) is only possible if the AFK happens during the first 3 minutes of the match and if someone is marked *inactive* for 90 seconds or more. Remakes are not possible outside of these bounds.

[Reporting the players](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player) who went AFK and moving on is the best action to take here, because if they continue to AFK in matches, they'll be hit by the automated systems and receive penalties on their accounts.
